summary: The mode is the best werewolf vampire mod I ever made. hope you like. you want play with any other mode like this after you play with this mode.
descriptionHtml:
Vampire Powers

Ab Fortify Combat Heal Rate +10
Resist Poison <100>% Fortify Destruction <25>% Fortify Melee Damage <20>% Resist Damage <50>% Fortify Unarmed Damage <30> Fortify Illusion <25>% Fortify Sneak <40>% Waterbreathing Fortify Heal Rate in Combat. Vampires Do not Breath No Stamina Loss.

Vampire\'s Seduction

Vampire\'s Seduction 85 dar 300 5000feet 1 a day

Vampire Drain

VampireDrain01 5
VampireDrain02 7
VampireDrain03 8
VampireDrain04 10

Vampire\'s Sight and smell

You can see in the dark and Smell others.Toggle on and off to Sniff. Smell were others have been some times you forget Smells And some times you smell were others wer Standing for a long Time and were they some times Go Mainly were thay are now.

Vampire\'s Servant

Vampire\'s Servant1 Lv 10 npc dar 60
Vampire\'s Servant2 Lv 25 npc dar 60
Vampire\'s Servant3 Lv 30 npc dar 60
Vampire\'s Servant4 Lv 100 npc dar 300

Weakness to Sunlight1

Health, Magicka, and Stamina do recover while in Sunlight.Sunlight is unpleasant.

Weakness to Sunlight2

Your Healing and Magicka Rate are <50>% in Sunlight.

Weakness to Sunlight3

Your Healing and Magicka Rate are <25>% in Sunlight.

Weakness to Sunlight4

Your Healing and Magicka Rate are <0>% in Sunlight you allso take Sundamage <10> per sec.

Werewolf Feed

Werewolf Feed heals 300

Werewolf Powers

ResistDisease 100
ResistDamage 75
FortifyStamina 1000
Resistmagic 75
ResistPoison 50
You can now be both vampire and werewolf Become a werewolf first then a vampire and you get both. Try races without resist Disease this is the only drawback.

to install put the plugin in this      C:\\Program Files\\steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
if your windows 7         C:\\Program Files (x86)\\steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

if there are bugs post me after download and I well fix what I can. Feel free to post Ideas to fix plugin Thank you for download.
author: Marshall White
